title: New: The Familiar – Dark Eyes
body:
The project of **Ruthy Mirsky** and **Mads Martinsen** from Brooklyn via Tromsø, **The Familiar** mix all the best parts of Scandi-pop with the energetic feel-good factor of **CHVRCHES**.

Their debut track, _Dark Eyes_ is lustful and seductive in equal measures, verging upon being an indie-dance hit. Check it out below.

Their debut track, Dark Eyes is lustful and seductive in equal measures, verging upon being an indie-dance hit. Check it out below.
